Let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go!
My daughter.
I can't take it, Ma!
Come.
Easy, girl, easy.
Ahh!
I'll take a look.

text: Tamam, sakin ol Ben bir bakayım
english: Okay, take it easy. I'll take a look.
Aaaa!
Don't!
Don't!
Ahh!
Let's hope it's a blessing.
Aaaa!
Don't do that!

text: Bey babam yalnız mı kaldı ana?
english: Is my father alone, Mother?
Nay, but with him is the Beneficent Allah.
Don't worry about it.

text: Sen de git babamın yanına Gündoğdu yalnız kalmasın
english: You go to my father. He's not to be alone.
I said go.
Kurdoğlu
You've passed the test of dignity.
With wolves, bears...

text: …her türlü ölüm kalım tehlikeleriyle savaştınız, obanıza döndünüz
english: ...fighting all kinds of life-and-death threats, turning into your obama.

text: Artık Alplik unvanını şerefle taşımaya hakkınız vardır
english: Now you have the right to honor the title of Alplik

text: Lakin şimdi almanız gereken ders tüm bu zorluklardan daha mühimdir
english: But the lesson you need to learn now is more important than all these challenges.
The Alps aren't about feeding in poverty...
...to stand upright in hardship.
Solomon Shah
Kurdoğlu, Alpine Sungur...
...take an arrow from your friends.
Break it down!

text: Tirkeşlerinizden birer ok daha alıp bana verin
english: Take another arrow from your smokers and give it to me.

text: İşte siz de ata öğüdüne uyup birlik olursanız…
english: So if you follow the advice of the horse and stick together...
...you won't break like these arrows.

text: Gayrı bundan sonra isminiz de cisminiz de hiç ayrılmasın
english: From now on, keep your name and body together.
Let your mothers remember you together.
Why is it dark in here?
The Beneficent God!
Here you are, sir.
Why aren't these lamps lit, Rahman?
I don't know, sir.
If the Hour were to come, you would not know.
Sir...

text: Bir şeyler bulup şu yarığı kapat Tamam beyim
english: Find something and close this rift. Yes, sir.

text: Burada olanlardan hiç kimsenin haberi olmayacak
english: No one will ever know what happened here.

text: Babamın yanından bir an bile ayrılma
english: Don't leave my father's side for a moment
Yes, sir.
Thank God it's a good sign of pain.
Well, motherhood's a pain in the ass...
The end is mercy.

text: Bu dar zamanda hepimizi mutlu ettin
english: You've made us all happy in this tight time.

text: Allah’ım sağ salim kucağımıza almayı nasip eder inşallah
english: May God grant us a safe embrace.
I hope so, Mother.

text: Bey babam da tez vakitte sağlığına kavuşursa sevinecektir
english: My father will be happy if he recovers soon.
Wouldn't he be happy?

text: Kaç zamandır torun yolu gözler dururduk
english: We've been watching the grandkids for a long time.
He'll be happy.
Sister
Gökçe {\cH00FF00}
♪ It's dawn ♪
Son, we're looking forward to...
...Selcan's daughter-in-law is pregnant.

text: Boyumuza soy, soyumuza bey olur inşallah
english: Strip us down, I hope he'll take credit for our bloodline.
Inshallah.
Thank you. Thank you, Mother.
Happy Agha
Thank you, Gökçe Hatun.
Mister, if you hadn't put my father alone
She's not alone. She's with Rahman.

text: Sen iyi ol da. Merak etme
english: Just be good, don't worry.

text: Kancığa bak hele! Önce beni çadıra yolladı…
english: The bitch sent me to the tent first.
And then she put her husband on top of me.
He had Solomon kill the Shah...

text: …babası Alp Sungur’un intikamını almak istemiş demek
english: So his father wanted to avenge the death of Alp Sungur.

text: Aklınca beni de Gündoğdu’ya yem edecekti
english: In his mind, he was going to feed me to the sunrise.
Two birds with one stone
We couldn't figure out the bitch's game.
When the wolf has a husband, he's a fool of the dog.

text: Ne dersin Alpargu, kocadık mı yoksa?
english: What do you say, Alpargu, are we old?

text: Bu seslere yüreğim dayanmıyor Keşke öldürüp yaksaydık Akçakoca
english: I can't stand these sounds I wish we'd killed them and burned them

text: Bu hastalık senin bildiğin hastalıklardan değil evlat
english: This disease isn't your usual disease, son.

text: Bu hayvanların etine, kanına dokundun mu bütün oba mahvolur, telef olur
english: If you touch the flesh and blood of these animals, the whole thing will be ruined.
Our Holy Mother
...give me a light to light up my heart
If my father is alive and I can get him back...
...show me a sign.
Altes, are you here?
Amen.

text: Bana gerçekleri öğrenmeye hazır olduğunuzu söylemiştiniz
english: You told me you were ready to learn the truth.
Then come with me.
Is this it?
You've never seen me, Altes.
Is my father behind this door?
Dad!
My daughter.
Dad!
My daughter!
Dad...
Dad!
My daughter!
Dad, I thought you'd been killed for years.
You've been on my mind for years.

text: Size kavuşma umudum beni hayatta tuttu
english: My hope of getting back to you kept me alive.
Dad, why are you here?
Your mother, your sister, you...
Every night you're in my dreams.
My mother...
What happened to your mother, girl?
We lost to the plague last year.
Dad, why are they keeping you here?
My uncle told us you were dead.

text: Amcam senin burada olduğunu biliyor mu?
english: Does my uncle know you're here?

text: Onunla konuşup seni buradan hemen çıkartacağım
english: I'm gonna talk to him and get you out of here right now.
My daughter!
Huh!
Dad!
My daughter!
Dad...
My daughter!
My baby!
My baby!
Elenora!
My baby!
Elenora!
May the Lord have mercy on you!
May the Lord have mercy on you!

text: Velhasıl Ertuğrul Bey’im ozanın da dediği gibi
english: As Mr. Ertugrul said, so did the poet.
I'm burned, I'm burned, I'm burned
I've been a pain in the ass.
I was a witness. I became a servant.
* With the fire of love *
Excuse me, sir.
It's your turn to watch.
I couldn't sleep.
Halima...
...you know...
You've got a lot of problems, but...
...strength...
...is also in the faith of power.

text: Ama bir tanesi var ki dertlerin…
english: But one of them is that your troubles...
...and it's the most beautiful...
...and burn my heart.
You're the only one who can handle it.
That beautiful-eyed gazelle...
...takes me away, gets me in the way...
...he brought her to you and threw her in love.

text: Ben tam onun canını almaya meyletmiştim ki…
english: I was about to take his life...
...has set my heart on fire for love.
What I'm saying is...
...from the first day I saw you...
Don't say it, Ertugrul, shut up!
I won't shut up!

text: Seni kendi ellerimle benden uzaklara yollayamam
english: I can't send you away with my own hands
Don't go.
Stay with me.
The Sultan of my heart...
...the mother of my children...
...be the friend of my life.

text: Cesur, dürüst, güzel yürekli bir yiğitsin sen Ertuğrul Bey
english: You are a brave, honest, beautiful heart Mr. Ertugrul

text: Sana can borcumuz artık bir değil, bindir
english: The life we owe you is no longer the same. Get it on.

text: Ama benim kaderim çok önceden yazılmıştır
english: But my fate is written long ago.

text: Babamı ve kardeşimi meçhule bırakıp sevda peşinden gidemem
english: I can't leave my father and my brother in the dark and go after him.
Not even the sultan of the palace I was born in.
I can't be the Sultan of your heart.
That's what your tongue says.
What about your heart?
What does your heart say, Halima?

text: Dilim ne söylerse yüreğimin de söylediği odur
english: My tongue is what my heart says
Don't go!
Ahh!
Halima!
Halima!
Halima!
Halima!
Halima!
Halima!
